content: spruce up your space with this adorable crochet hanging plant that you never have to water created in bernat maker minis the basket is worked in the round stuffed and topped with dirt while the plant is made by working double_crochet pearls along a chain also practice single_crochet increases decreases and joining pieces with slip_stitch techniques make a few and line them up on your windowsill for a touch of whimsical joy materials bernat® maker minis™ kit includes 10 balls 1 7 oz/50 g each 17 6 oz/500 g total 61yds/ 56m each 610 yds/560 m total contrast a cream 1 ball or 25 yds/23 m contrast b brown 1 ball or 10yds/9 m contrast c green 1 ball or 32 yds/39 m small amount of red for embroidery measurement approx 4 10 cm tall excluding hanging straps
